mita amatharawa mama ranganayen dayaka wuna ‘widiya bandara’, ‘hiruta muwawen’, ‘channa kinnarawi’, ‘duwana babar’, yana teli natya wikashaya wenna niyamithawa thiyenawa.eranga senarathnage ‘okkoma pisso’, ‘none mage sudu none’ saha janaka arawindage ‘perakadoru gate’ chithrapatawalatath ranganayen dayaka wennath mata awasthawa labuna.

waskaduwe dhammarama namathi chiwaradhariya, ratha්ri 9.30 ta pamana, polu muguru aran niwasakata pana, ehi siti manasika rogiyekuta, paharadimata erehiwa nithiya ka්riyathmaka nokaranne, agamathi ha polisiya bara amathige upades mathada?idiri palath sabha mathiwaranayata eksath jathika pakshayen tharanga wadimata apeksha karanne mema chiwaradhariyage sohoyurek bawa pa්rakasha we.nithiya matha palanaya binda watima ha rate chiwaradharinge thaththwaya da mema siddhiyen manawa pahadili we.
